titleStmt.title: The ceremonies, solemnities, and prayers, vsed at the opening of the holy gates of foure churches, within the citie of Rome, in the yere of Iubile and also the great Iubile for this yeere of our Lord 1600. graunted by Pope Clement the eight, that now is; together with the bull of the said Pope Clement, made touching the Iubile, for all those that shall visite the great churches of S. Peter, S. Paul, S. Iohn de Latran, and S. Marie maior, in the citie of Rome, this present yeere of our Lord 1600. aforesaid.
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church.
Catholic Church. Pope (1592-1605 : Clement VIII). Annus Domini placabilis. English.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
